pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hypothesis Matrix Translation // Translation between experimental null hypotheses, hypothesis matrices, and contrast matrices as used in linear regression models. The package is based on the method described in Schad, Vasishth, Hohenstein, and Kliegl (2019) doi:10.1016/j.jml.2019.104038 and Rabe, Vasishth, Hohenstein, Kliegl, and Schad (2020) doi:10.21105/joss.02134.
